definitions.title: n.[ m.]
definitions.body: only pl. wares (as left in the purchaser's hand; cf. As.uzub(b)u, a specif. payment);—sf. 2 fs. [[עִזְּבוֹנַיִךְ]] Ez Eze 27:27, Eze 27:33, [[נׇ֑יִךְ]]- v:Eze 27:12 + 4 t.;—wares, only Ez Eze 27 (oft. ‖[[מַעֲרָב]] q. v. sub [[ערב]]); ´[[בַּרְזֶל בְּדִיל וְעוֹפֶרֶת נׇֽתְנוּ ע]] Ez Eze 27:12 iron, tin and lead they furnished as thy wares; similarly v:Eze 27:14, v:Eze 27:22; also v:Eze 27:16 (MT ´[[בְּע]], but prob. de1 [[בְּ]]); [[נׇֽתְנוּ]] ´[[בְּע]] v:Eze 27:19 at the price of  (in exchange for) thy wares they furnished, etc.; ´[[הוֹנֵךְ וְע]] (as subj. of sentence) v:Eze 27:27; [[בְּחֵאת]] [[מִיַּמִּים]] ´[[ע]] v:Eze 27:33 when thy wares came forth, etc.
